metadata.title: CVE-2023-52868 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:thermal: core: prevent potential string overflowThe dev->id value comes from ida_alloc() so it's a number between zeroand INT_MAX.  If it's too high then these sprintf()s will overflow.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
